name: Perfect Peel
description:
- The ultimate peeling experience
- Hundreds of fruits, vegetables and oddly items to peel
- Earn a wide variety of cutting objects as levels progress
- Peel in one continuous cut to reach perfect nirvana
- Super satisfying and relaxing game play
- Very realistic design and feeling.
developers: FOMO OYUN YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: FOMO OYUN YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
